solution_line_template: On Monday, there were {monday_visitors} visitors. On Tuesday, there were twice as many, so {tuesday_multiplier}*{monday_visitors} = {tuesday_visitors} visitors
The total number of visitors after Tuesday will be {tuesday_visitors}+{monday_visitors} = <<{tuesday_visitors}+{monday_visitors}={visitors_after_tuesday}>>{visitors_after_tuesday} visitors.

For the remaining {remaining_days} days, an average of {avg_visitors_remaining} visitors attended, giving a total of {remaining_days}*{avg_visitors_remaining} = <<{remaining_days}*{avg_visitors_remaining}={remaining_visitors}>>{remaining_visitors} visitors.

The total number of visitors who visited the library for the week was {remaining_visitors}+{visitors_after_tuesday} = <<{remaining_visitors}+{visitors_after_tuesday}={total_visitors}>>{total_visitors} visitors.
